verses.text:
Gently think and gently speak
Of the erring and the weak;
Still their hearts are very tender,
Still their hopes are very low.

Do not break the bruised reed,
Do not let the smoking flax
Be extinguished by thy deed,
Still their hearts are very tender.

Gently judge and gently speak
Of the failing and the weak;
Still their hearts are very tender,
Still their hopes are very low.

Let love What thou canst not undo,
Gently think and gently speak,
But let narrow hearts grow deep,
But let narrow hearts grow deep.
